attributes.action: Ensure that all local councils actually do recycle all the recyclables separated by residents
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the revelations that some local Councils in Britain have been found to still put all recyclables in landfill, despite the hard and conscientious efforts of residents separating recyclables from other waste, all councils recycling facilities should be inspected to ensure these materials ARE recycled.
